title: Calories in a Serving of Miso Soup
meta_description: Discover calories in a miso soup serving, including full nutrition breakdown with protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Serving of Miso Soup
assumptions: Standard Japanese miso soup with white miso paste, dashi broth, tofu, wakame seaweed, and green onions; 1 cup (240 ml) serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by miso type, brand, added ingredients, and portion size. Check labels or recipes for precision.

quick_answer.text: A standard serving of miso soup contains about 84 calories and 6 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

faqs.q: How many calories in a miso soup bowl?
faqs.a: About 84 calories for a standard 1-cup serving.

faqs.q: Is miso soup high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 1600 mg per serving due to miso pasteâ€”watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: What's the protein in miso soup?
faqs.a: Around 6 g per serving, mainly from tofu and miso.
Yes, about 10 g per serving, mostly from miso and any vegetables.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in miso soup?
faqs.a: Use less miso paste, skip tofu, or opt for vegetable-only versions to cut 20-30 kcal.
